features: ESSENTIAL MOISTURIZERS – Contains Vitamin E, Sunflower Seed Oil and Aloe to help replenish and seal in moisture
SHEA BUTTER – Rich shea butter helps restore and smooth dry skin
CONTINOUS MOISTURE – Provides all-day, intense hydration for thirsty skin
LIGHTLY FRAGRANCED – Shea butter wraps skin with a warm, comforting scent
body.description: Deeply hydrate and condition skin with Keri Shea Butter Lotion. This gentle daily moisturizer helps your skin feel smooth and look healthy from morning until night. Keri Shea Butter Lotion combines the rich, nourishing power of shea butter with three essential moisturizers: Vitamin E, Sunflower Seed Oil and Aloe. Keri Shea Butter is lightly fragranced with a warm, comforting scent.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #10,854 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #199 in Body Lotions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cannot Find Anywhere!
reviews.reviewText: THANK YOU SO MUCH for having the Keri lotion products! These are such good products, but are nearly impossible to find in any stores. Smells great and leaves you feeling moisturized, slightly greasy, but that leaves a nice shine on the skin and it still absorbs really well. Thicker texture which assures you it is not a watered down lotion product, great for the colder weather and a good night's sleep. I absolutely love this old school lotion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice lotion
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion, it is very soothing on my skin. The lotion has a soft scent, helps my dry skin and absorbs well. The lotion is of thick consistency, but goes on skin easily. The cost is very affordable too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 1 Application stopped the dead skin.
reviews.reviewText: I have been sleeping on dark sheets and I did not realize how much dead skin was falling off. My daughter recommended the Keri lotion and I have used it since then and it has completely stopped the dry skin cells on my sheets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A staple in the home!
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't be happier with my experience using Keri lotion! From the moment I opened the bottle, I was impressed with the creamy and smooth texture of the lotion. It doesn't leave any greasy residue or stickiness behind, which is a huge plus for me.One thing I really appreciate about this lotion is the light scent. It's not overpowering, so I can easily layer it with other scents I enjoy without feeling like I'm overdoing it.I first started using Keri lotion when my best friend's grandmother gave me a bottle as a gift, and now I can't imagine using anything else. My skin feels softer and more hydrated than ever before.Overall, I highly recommend Keri lotion to anyone looking for a nourishing and non-greasy lotion. It's a fantastic product that does exactly what it promises, and I look forward to continuing to use it for years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this lotion, it first rubs on oily but leaves your skin really soft and not dry/ashy. Walmart stopped carrying the shea butter one so I turned to Amazon. The only reason I’m not giving 5 stars is because I ordered this lotion not even a month ago for $5.97 and now I come back today to reorder it, and it’s almost $12 for 1 bottle. Lol not paying that for lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the thickness
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love the smell and just the right amount of thickness. I ran out of lotion and used some Shea butter from my cousin.,.. I loved the moisture and the smell was pleasant. Ordered my own Keri “Therapy” in a bottle… Try it you will be happy you did😍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars But lotion ever
reviews.reviewText: I have used Keri Lotion since nursing school in 1968. Use to us it in bath water when giving bed baths to people with dry skin, The product has just gotten better. At first it feels oily but it soaks in your sink in just a few mins. Works great on your face & legs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 67-year-olds with diabetic skin and live in dry climate. Please buy this you will not be disappointed. I applied the lotion while still damp from the shower. I have used carry products for a long time now and as far as a lotion this is the best I have found for my skin. You'll be so you will be pleasantly surprised and a wonderful scent. Worth the purchase.
